document_data.name: Grimalkin
document_data.text: I opened my eyes at nine o'clock to find Grimalkin standing on my chest, pressing his soft nose against my cheeks to wake me, and giving my chin a quick lick with his tongue. One needs no [[water clock]] with Benelaius's brilliant menagerie.
document_data.mainbody: He regularly lay on Benelaius's lap and liked being rubbed behind the ears.
document_data.Abilities: Along with [[Razor (cat)|Razor]], Grimalkin was one of almost a hundred cats in Benalaius's possession. They served him as companions, guardians, and agents, and were good judges of character. He could communicate silently with them.

He regularly lay on Benelaius's lap and liked being rubbed behind the ears.
document_data.History: By occupying Benelaius's lap after midnight on [[Eleint 20]] of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, Grimalkin was one of a number of cats present at the meeting of townsfolk he called to reveal the murderer of [[Dovo]] and [[Grodoveth]], as well as an [[Iron Throne]] spy ring.
